title: Movin' On
description: Welcome to the world of Amanda Hocking's best selling novel HOLLOWLAND as never seen before - adapted and enhanced by #1 New York Times bestseller Tony Lee (X-Men Unlimited, Doctor Who), with superb artwork by Steve Uy (Avengers Initiative, JSA Classified). Max is bitten, and Remy waits for him to turn into a zombie as Private Beck and his men arrive. Lazlo escapes from his Hollywood vault deathtrap, and Blue Adams makes a choice about his future that changes his life forever. Remy meanwhile meets Harlow in a military quarantine as the issue ends, and Amanda Hocking's best selling novel HOLLOWLAND begins, adapted and enhanced by #1 New York Times bestseller Tony Lee (X-Men Unlimited, Doctor Who), with outstanding artwork by Steve Uy (Avengers Initiative, JSA Classified)! Dynamite Entertainment proudly presents Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland graphic novel. Amanda Hocking is the New York Times bestselling author of the Trylle trilogy and six additional self-published novels. After selling over a million copies of her books, primarily in eBook format, she is widely considered the exemplar of self-publishing success in the digital age. Hollowland is the first book in the young adult dystopian series 'The Hollows', and Amanda has personally overseen and approved this Hollowland graphic novel project. Each book in this series will be released digital-only, with the 10-issue print collection of the graphic novel to be published Q4 2013.
author: Amanda Hocking
